DeckWithRevealedCards - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.deck
This abstract class represents a deck of cards that can have two cards revealed on the table at a time, one on the left and one on the right.

gets first card and removes it from the deck
directDrawGoldCard(ClientHandler) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.GameController
allows the player associated with the ClientHandler to directly draw a gold card from the deck.
directDrawResourceCard(ClientHandler) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.GameController

drawLeftRevealedResourceCard(ClientHandler) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.GameController

draws the right revealed card from the board and replaces it with the top card
